author: vhardy
msg: Modified the getXXBounds methods so that null bounds are possible,
to represent GraphicsNode with no content, which may happen on empty
group. Previously, empty groups were reporting a Rectangle(0, 0, 0, 0)
bounds which would cause potentially large errors/problems.
Benchmarks showed no performance degradation due to that change.
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag

author: vhardy
msg: a. Added a getInverseTransform to GraphicsNode (for event handling).
